Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class GraphArea

Defines the area in which a data set will be displayed. Creates a set of DataPoints with which data can be displayed on the curved plane.

Inheritance
System.Object
UnityEngine.Object
UnityEngine.Component
UnityEngine.Behaviour
UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour
GraphArea
Namespace: DUKE.UI
Assembly: Assembly-CSharp.dll
Syntax
[ExecuteAlways]
public class GraphArea : MonoBehaviour
